Berserker's Eye.base_effect: All damage dealt +5.50%, but damage taken +5%
Berserker's Eye.rank_10_effect: Increases all damage you deal by 16%, but also increases all damage you take by 5%. Additionally, your Critical Hit Chance is increased by 2%.

Blessed Pebble.base_effect: Duration of beneficial effects increased by 8.00%
Blessed Pebble.rank_10_effect: Increases the duration of beneficial effects on you by 12% and increases your Movement Speed by 8% for 3 seconds after gaining a beneficial effect.

Blessing of the Worthy.base_effect: 20% chance when taking damage to deal 12% of max life to nearby enemies

Blood-Soaked Jade.base_effect: Up to 8% increased damage at full life (min 4% at low life), +10% Movement Speed

Ca'arsen's Invigoration.rank_10_effect: Increases the speed of your Primary Attack by 16% and the damage of your Primary Attack by 2%.

Chained Death.base_effect: Damage +1.50% per target hit (max 4.5% with 3 targets)

Chip of Stoned Flesh.base_effect: Loss of control applies explosive curse dealing 45% of damage taken (max 150% base)
Chip of Stoned Flesh.rank_10_effect: Explosive curse deals 300% base damage to nearby enemies when control effects expire. Additionally, enemies hit by the explosion take 10% increased damage for 5 seconds.

Cutthroat's Grin.base_effect: Gain 8.00% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind
Cutthroat's Grin.rank_10_effect: Gain 24% increased Critical Hit Chance when attacking from behind. Additionally, you deal 4% increased damage while attacking from behind.

Everlasting Torment.base_effect: Critical hits cause agony: 10% base damage + 122/sec for 6s
Everlasting Torment.rank_10_effect: Your critical hits inflict agony, dealing 16.7% base damage + 202 every second for 3 seconds. Each enemy cannot be affected by this more often than once every 6 seconds. Additionally, you gain 6% increased attack speed while any enemy is suffering from your agony.

Fervent Fang.base_effect: Each hit increases damage by 0.80%, up to 0.80*10% at 10 stacks
Fervent Fang.rank_10_effect: Each time you deal damage to an enemy, that enemy now takes 2.4% increased damage from your attacks, up to a maximum increase of 24% at 10 stacks. Additionally, you deal 6% increased damage to Elite monsters.

Follower's Burden.base_effect: Increases damage by 1.00% for each summon, up to maximum increase of 6%

Frozen Heart.base_effect: When damaged, activates Frigid Shield absorbing 150% base damage + 1,458

Hellfire Fragment.base_effect: Conjures 3 hellfire blazes dealing 45% base damage + 510

Kir Sling.base_effect: 15% chance when attacked to release burst of light that Blinds enemies for 1.30 seconds

Lightning Core.base_effect: Primary Attacks and movement charge electricity, releasing 90% base damage + 1134 chain lightning

Mocking Laughter.base_effect: Primary Attack forces non-Elite monsters to attack you for 2.00 seconds
Mocking Laughter.rank_10_effect: Your Primary Attack forces non-Elite monsters it hits to attack you for 2 seconds. Additionally, you take 2% reduced damage from monsters affected by Mocking Laughter.

Mother's Lament.base_effect: When you deal damage, you have a 20% chance to gain Maternal Disdain, increasing your Critical Hit Chance by 12% for 6 seconds. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds. When Maternal Disdain ends, you release a blood spike toward nearby enemies, dealing base damage and causing them to Bleed.
Mother's Lament.rank_10_effect: Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Maternal Disdain, increasing your Critical Hit Chance by 20% for 6 seconds. When Maternal Disdain ends, you release a blood spike toward nearby enemies, dealing 300% base damage and causing them to Bleed for 50% base damage over 5 seconds.

Pain Clasp.base_effect: Increases damage dealt by 8.00% to enemies suffering from continuous damage effect

Pain of Subjugation.base_effect: 5.50% increased damage vs enemies suffering loss of control
Pain of Subjugation.rank_10_effect: You deal 16% increased damage to enemies suffering loss of control. Additionally, you take 2% reduced damage while suffering loss of control.

Power & Command.base_effect: Alternates states every 9s: Power increases Primary Attack damage by 8.00%, Command increases skill damage by 8.00%

Respite Stone.rank_10_effect: Decreases all damage you take by 5.5% for every 10% your Life is below maximum, up to a maximum damage decrease of 16.5%. Additionally, you gain 4.5% increased Armor while your Life is below 50%.

The Black Rose.base_effect: 10% chance when attacked to summon vines that Immobilize attacker for 1.10 seconds
The Black Rose.rank_10_effect: Each time you are attacked, you have a 10% chance to summon vines that Immobilize the attacker for 1.1 seconds. Each enemy cannot be affected by this more often than once every 20 seconds. Additionally, you deal 2% increased damage to Immobilized enemies.

The Hunger.base_effect: Heal 40% base damage + 567 Life each time you defeat an enemy

Viper's Bite.base_effect: Inflicts Viper's Venom dealing 16% base damage + 120 every second for 6 seconds
Viper's Bite.rank_10_effect: Your attacks poison enemies, dealing 32% base damage + 480 every second for 6 seconds. Additionally, poisoned enemies have their Attack Speed reduced by 10%.

Zod Stone.rank_10_effect: Increases the duration of your Ultimate Skills by 16%. Additionally, your Ultimate Skills deal 2% increased damage.

Seled's Weakening.base_effect: 6.00% increased damage for 60s after killing Elite monster
Seled's Weakening.rank_10_effect: Gain 16% increased damage for 60 seconds after killing an Elite monster. Additionally, you deal 2% increased damage to Elite monsters.

Battleguard.base_effect: Decreases melee damage taken by 8.00% from enemies within 3 yards

Bottled Hope.base_effect: Using a buff increases target's damage and movement speed by 8% for 6s
Bottled Hope.rank_10_effect: Using skills to grant buffs increases damage done and Movement Speed of the target by 12% for 8 seconds. Additionally, the duration of all buffs on you is increased by 4 seconds.

Seeping Bile.base_effect: 4% chance to poison enemies for 25% base damage + 263/s for 6s, spreads on death

The Abiding Curse.base_effect: 15% chance to curse enemies, reducing Attack and Movement Speeds by 35% for 2.50 seconds

Bloody Reach.base_effect: Increases damage by 2.00% for every 2 yards between you and enemy (max 8% at 8 yards)
Bloody Reach.rank_10_effect: Your attacks deal 6% increased damage for every 2 yards between you and the enemy hit, up to a maximum of 24% at 8 yards. Additionally, your attacks have a 1.2% chance to decrease enemy Attack and Movement Speed by 35% for 2 seconds.

Grim Rhythm.base_effect: Dealing damage increases your Attack Speed by 0.8% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 10 times. While at full stacks, your Movement Speed is increased by 9%.

Starfire Shard.base_effect: When you deal damage, you have a 30% chance to rain meteorites in an area, dealing 200% base damage in total. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds.

Unity Crystal.base_effect: You and party members take 0.50% reduced damage per additional party member within 6 yards

Volatility Shard.base_effect: Defeating enemy triggers explosion dealing 30% base damage + 365 to nearby enemies

Stormvault.base_effect: Conjures pursuing storm for 6s dealing 22.5% base damage + 203 every 0.5s

Echoing Shade.base_effect: 15% chance to summon shadow clone for 8s with some abilities
Echoing Shade.rank_10_effect: Your attacks have a 20% chance to summon a shadow clone for 12 seconds. Additionally, shadow clones gain 100% of your damage and Life stats.

Phoenix Ashes.base_effect: Prevents fatal damage and grants shield absorbing 450% base damage

Concentrated Will.base_effect: Dash skill calls guardian angel, deals 55% base damage + 547
Concentrated Will.rank_10_effect: Using a Dash skill summons a guardian angel to your aid, dealing 120% base damage to all enemies in its path. Additionally, your Dash skills have their cooldowns reduced by 2 seconds.

Howler's Call.base_effect: 10% chance on Primary Attack to summon spirit wolf dealing 150% base damage + 1,458
Howler's Call.rank_10_effect: Primary Attacks have a 20% chance to summon a spirit wolf that deals 240% base damage to all enemies in its path. Additionally, the spirit wolf howls, increasing your damage by 10% for 6 seconds.

Maw of the Deep.base_effect: Creates whirlpool that pulls enemies, sea monster erupts for 140% base damage + 1701

Roiling Consequence.base_effect: Enters roiling rage for 6s, +12% Crit Chance, crits cause explosion dealing 36% base damage over 3s

Zwenson's Haunting.base_effect: On enemy defeat, dark beast attacks dealing 50% base damage + 486
Zwenson's Haunting.rank_10_effect: Summons a dark beast to attack nearby enemies after defeating an enemy, dealing 200% base damage. Additionally, the dark beast causes enemies to flee in terror for 2 seconds.

Spiteful Blood.base_effect: Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Spiteful Blood to surge through you for 4 seconds, increasing your damage done by 30% and making you invulnerable to Primary Attacks from other players. Additionally, when Spiteful Blood triggers, you gain an absorb shield equal to 160% of your base damage. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 20 seconds.
Spiteful Blood.rank_10_effect: Taking damage while below 50% Life causes Spiteful Blood to surge, increasing your damage by 40% for 6 seconds and making you invulnerable to damage. Additionally, you gain an absorb shield equal to 200% of your base damage while the effect is active.

Void Spark.base_effect: Conjures Void Spark for 6s, 30% chance to chain lightning to 8 enemies dealing 45% base damage + 446

Gloom Cask.base_effect: Primary Attack unleashes Aspect of Gloom for 6s, triggering gloom blades dealing 30% base damage + 275
Gloom Cask.rank_10_effect: Your Primary Attacks unleash an Aspect of Gloom that lasts 10 seconds, during which your Primary Attacks deal 60% additional AoE damage.
